source.title: Image Dithering: Eleven Algorithms and Source Code
source.description: the article that served as the original inspiration for Dithermark

source.title: This blog post on Uncharted 4
source.description: details how they used dithering to simulate semi-transparent foliage in front of the camera

source.title: Dithering on the GPU
source.description: the inspiration to port the dithers to WebGL, and the source for the hue-lightness dithering algorithm

source.title: a dither
source.description: the basis for the arithmetic dithers

source.title: This codegolf challenge to dither an image
An Overview of Color Quantization Techniques
Octree color quantizer in Python
source.description: the basis for the octree optimize palette algorithm

source.title: Seven grayscale conversion algorithms
source.description: interesting article about how something as seemingly as simple as converting an image into black and white is really not so simple. Also is the inpiration for the color dither 'Luma' color comparison algorithm

source.title: WebGL Fundamentals
source.description: a great resource for learning WebGL, this page on recreating DrawImage was used when implementing the dithers in WebGL

source.title: WebGL Stats
source.description: the closest thing to Can I useâ€¦ for WebGL support

source.title: Improvements to the canonical one-liner GLSL rand()
source.description: the source for the random function used in the WebGL dithers

source.title: WebGL Bitwise functions
source.description: the source for the bitwise functions used in the WebGL arithmetic dithers

source.title: Pixelator
source.description: desktop app specifically made to turn your photos into pixel art

source.title: Halftone Pro
source.description: cool web app that showcases halftoning, another type of dithering

source.title: webgl-filter
source.description: showcase image filters in WebGL. The source for the denoise filter as well as the contrast algorithm used on Safari and Edge
